item.title: Welcome to my Internet Corner!
item.description: Hi! My name is Chris. I’m a software developer from Southern California. Currently, I work for an electric vehicle company doing DevOps stuff. I’m interested in automating things in the cloud ‚òÅÔ∏è, Rust ü¶Ä, and all things tech. I plan on using this blog as a way to record what I learn and other information. If you’re looking to learn something, you’ve come to the wrong page.
